title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Observability & Security unite: Unify your data in Amazon CloudWatch (COP361)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 可观测性与安全性结合：在 Amazon CloudWatch 中统一您的数据 (COP361)
abstract: Managing operational, security, and compliance data in separate silos slows troubleshooting and weakens security posture. Learn how Amazon CloudWatch's enhanced capabilities unify your data with flexible analytics across teams and use cases. See how leading organizations leverage CloudWatch's simplified log management and integrated analytics to accelerate root cause analysis and enable comprehensive insights
abstract_cn: 在独立的孤岛中管理运营、安全和合规数据会减缓故障排查速度并削弱安全态势。了解 Amazon CloudWatch 的增强功能如何通过跨团队和用例的灵活分析来统一您的数据。了解领先组织如何利用 CloudWatch 的简化日志管理和集成分析来加速根本原因分析并实现全面洞察
